Title: [L-01] Nonce used for multiple purposes
Content: The nonce mapping used for `permit()` calls is the same as the one used for `delegateBySig()`. This should at the very least be documented so signers know that the order of operations between the two functions matters, and so that `multicall()`s can be organized appropriately ```solidity File: lib/flywheel-v2/src/token/ERC20MultiVotes.sol #1 392 require(nonce == nonces[signer]++, "ERC20MultiVotes: invalid nonce"); ``` [ERC20MultiVotes.sol#L392](https://github.com/fei-protocol/flywheel-v2/blob/77bfadf388db25cf5917d39cd9c0ad920f404aad/src/token/ERC20MultiVotes.sol#L392)
